column1: full, angles across him, and he brings his big bat down to defend this
length, pitches around leg and angles across him, and he defends from the crease
length, angles away and he drives this towards mid off. Seems to have jammed this a bit on his bat handle. Wrings his hands briefly
length, straight, and he defends this straight back down the pitch
length, angles away, and he leaves. Dies a bit on the way through to Pant. Sums up how low and slow this pitch is expected to be
length, and he defends from the crease
length, angles into him but strays down the leg side. Off his pads towards square leg
wide of the crease, good bounce as Gayle has a poke at it, but he has overstepped! Free hit coming up
LAUNCHES THIS DEEP OVER MIDWICKET! Regulation length ball, angles into him, and he swings merrily. Gets enough of the bat to smash this high and wide
length, nibbles away and he lets it pass
back of a length, angles into him from wide of the crease, and he defends
fuller, straighter, and he defends this, with one hand coming off as he dobbles it straight back down the pitch
lofts a length ball that angles into him, and gets it into the vacant deep midwicket area
length, angles away and he punches this towards mid off
angles away from him and he drives this square but towards cover
length, and he pushes this to the left of mid off and sets off. They make it despite a direct hit from Rohit Sharma, who throws this underarm
length, and he punches this straight back towards the bowler
length, angles away, and Gayle has a nibble at it. Just past the outside edge on its way through to Pant
slower ball, fuller, and he takes the top hand off as he drives this to mid off
length, shapes away after pitching outside off, and he leaves
length, angles in, and he gets behind the line to push this back down the pitch
length, and he presses forward and drives this. Doesn't go along the air, and it drops just short of short cover
fuller, and he drives this moving forward, but cannot beat midwicket
length, tucks into him and cramps him for room again. Drives, but cannot beat the off side ring, hitting it straight to cover point
length, and he presses forward to drive this to cover
length, at his pads, and he misses out on an attempted flick. The ball trickles away towards short fine leg, and gives them enough time to tick over for a leg bye
presses forward and drives uppishly towards point. Jadeja dives away to his right and saves this
lucky runs! Fuller, and he was looking to drive this through the covers. Goes off the inside of the bat and goes down towards fine leg, beating Pant's outstretched glove
this is better! Slower ball, fuller, and he picked this early, and went over midwicket. Not off the middle, but good enough to run away for four
fuller, and he has to dig this out. Was honing it towards his leg stump, and he jammed his bat right down on time
digs this in short, but down the leg side. It is called wide. Was an attempt at the slow bouncer
GIGANTIC! Another slower ball, floated out outside off, and he frees his arms and goes inside out. This one has gone top of the second tier!
SIX FOR GAYLE THIS TIME! Length ball, and he came over the wicket for this, and Gayle hangs back and then goes through with a straight swing. Well over mid on
length, straightens into him, and he defends
hangs back and biffs this one over the infield on the off side. Length ball, but offers room for him outside off
digs this in short, and he shovels this away over midwicket. Won't go all the way to the fence, as it pulls up before mid on can get across to that ball
SHOT! Back of a length again, and he hangs back and smashes this over midwicket. Good enough timing this time
full, outside off, and he opens up the offside this time. Terrifc cover drive, with a partially bent knee to top it off. This would have been a photographer's delight!
length, and he drives this hard, but there's a sweeper at the deep point fence now. Some movement for him to do, but they amble through for a single
length, outside off, and he just biffs this down towards long on. Mid on is up inside the circle, so the challenge was just to clear him. Not off the middle, but good enough!
short, and he looks to swing this around towards long on. Off the outside edge, as he skews this towards deep midwicket, but it lands well short of the fielder!
digs this in short, and called a wide. Lewis needs to do nothing with this as it angles across him

WHAT A SHOT! Short, and down the leg side, and he just moves across a bit and smacks this well over fine leg. The man stationed there is inside the circle anyway, but he strikes this well enough to go all the way. The Indian seamers' lengths have been all over the place so far
length ball, and he defends this as it angles across him, through towards cover point
nurdles a length ball away towards deep square leg
short of a length, and Lewis swivel-pulls this...for SIX!

short, and he hangs back and swings this towards deep midwicket. There is a deep square leg in place, but this was struck with such power, that he can only move a couple of metres and fetch that from beyond the boundary ropes!
slower ball, outside off, and he brings his bat down to guide this towards a deepish gully placed for him
full, and in his slot, and he goes over midwicket. Just a little trigger movement to get into position, and then he just backs himself to clear the infield
short, outside off, and he drives this towards deep point, where there's a sweeper in place
slower short ball, and he slaps it away towards Chahal at deep midwicket
slower ball, attempts to go wide of the crease, but overcooks it. Way beyond the tramlines on the offside
full, on off stump, and he slogs this past mid on. Gets enough so that it races away past Yuzi Chahal posted there

Chahal is at long on, but still fails to catch up with this! In his slot, and he just swings this from the crease, and muscles it over the long on fence. Not far from the fielder, but too much work for him
quick single taken with a flick towards short fine leg. Full ball up in length
wide of off stump, slower in pace, and he slashes this one towards deep backward point. Needed to get this finer and he would have picked up more than one, maybe even four!
slower ball, on leg stump, and he plays it down towards deep square leg. Dhawan comes in from there and limits the scoring to one
full, on off stump, and he goes inside out. Bounces just inside the ropes as he clears the infield comfortably!
just clears midwicket, but what a knock this has been! Short enough to go back and he smashes this over the man stationed there. Acknowledges the applause after crossing fifty

one-handed six over long leg! The Universe Boss is currently toying with the Indian attack, as he takes a short ball and looks to hook this away. Gets the top hand off, but has timed it well enough to clear the fence
backs away to the leg side and thwacks this over mid off. Off the toe-end, but through for four
another outside edge, this time flies over backward point, Rohit is the man in deep but it falls well short of him. Was a length ball outside off, but Gayle is least bothered today
length ball outside off, goes for the cut but ends up chopping it into the ground
a touch fuller outside off this time, Lewis aims for the sightscreen but fails to connect
length ball on the pads, looks to paddle away but misses
length ball on the stumps, defended from the crease
a slider, goes straight after pitching just outside off, Gayle looks to play it down the ground, misses
length ball outside off, tapped into the covers for one
fuller and just outside off, Lewis goes for the slog sweep but gets a top edge towards long-on, Dhawan keeps his calm to complete the catch despite a bit of wobble
length ball around off, comes forward and defends
length ball outside off, stands tall and punches it towards cover
short and wide and Gayle needs no second invitation, cuts it hard past the point fielder
length ball outside off, looks to go aerial down the ground but is cramped, the bottom hand comes off as he mistimes it over extra cover

good catch by Kohli diving forward at mid-off. Length ball outside off, Gayle flat-bats it but ends up hitting straight towards Kohli. Everybody is congratulating the big man. Smiles all around. Gayle acknowledges the crowd as he walks back. Think we have seen the last of him, at least in ODIs
short of length outside off, rising towards the batsman who stays back and drops it down
another short one, this time angling towards the batsman who ducks awkwardly and stays away from it
fuller on the stumps, pushed back towards the bowler
length ball outside off, pushes it towards extra cover
length ball on the leg stump, looks to flick it away, misses
length ball outside off, spinning big, Hope wasn't expecting that and ends up chipping it just over the cover fielder

another mis-hit, length ball on the stumps, Hetmyer goes for the pull but gets a top edge but the ball once again evades fielders, this time Jadeja who was running back from in front of the square leg
length ball on the pads, flicked away towards midwicket, calls for two and gets it comfortably
short of length on the stumps, stays back and turns it towards square leg
short of length outside off, steered towards third man
short of length and angling away, rises on his toes and punches it towards cover-point
fuller outside off, half a step forward and drives it towards sweeper cover, just for one alas
fuller on the stumps, punched firmly but Khaleel gets low in his followthrough and fields the ball
length ball around off and turning away, Hope was on the back foot, pushes it towards cover-point
fuller on the leg stump, lunges forward and works it towards short midwicket
fuller on the stumps once more, pushes it gently towards long-off on the front foot
length ball on the pads, turned away behind square with spin
tossed up outside off but too full, whipped towards extra cover while Kohli misfields, long-off comes to clean up
length ball on the pads, turns it around the corner and beats short fine leg
fuller outside off, smashes it along the ground but straight to extra cover
pitched up once again, punches it towards long-off
length ball on the pads, flicked away but straight to the fielder
a touch shorter and on the pads, whipped past square leg
fuller and tossed up outside off, comes forward and pushes back towards the bowler
pitched up on the stumps, whips towards the bowler who misfields and concedes a single
tossed up on the stumps, comes forward and defends
fuller on middle and leg, works it towards long-on for a walking single
length ball outside off and spinning back in, punched towards deep extra cover off the back foot
length ball on the pads, flicked away towards fine leg
length ball on the stumps, Hope stays back and defends inside out
length ball on middle and leg, comes forward and defends
length ball and angling in towards the stumps, Hetmyer gets his bat in front and turns it towards square leg
length ball on the pads, pushes it towards square leg
fuller on the stumps, driven back but Jadhav gets his foot in the way
fuller again, this time straight to Jadhav
length ball and Hope turns it towards square leg for one
length ball on the stumps, defended back to Jadhav's left
length ball outside off, beats the bat with turn as Hope pushes at it
comes forward, covers the spin this time and drives it down the ground
length ball on the stumps, turned away towards square leg
fuller on the stumps, skips down and looks to go over long-on but doesn't middle it and the ball dribbles towards deep midwicket
fuller on the leg stump, comes forward and drives it towards long-on to rotate the strike

flatter and quicker outside off, Hetmyer pushes it towards point, Hope was interested in a single but Hetmyer was late to react. The fielder charges towards the ball and throws it to the keeper but Hetmyer was quick enough to undo his steps
tossed up on the stumps, clears his front leg and drives it towards long-off
length ball on the stumps, kept a bit low, Hetmyer was on the back foot but gets his bat down in time
length ball on the stumps once more, whipped towards square leg
fuller outside off, comes forward and pushes it back towards the bowler
fuller on the stumps, flicked towards short midwicket
fuller around off, bowled closer from the stumps, blocked by Hope
length, turns back into him, and he whips it to square leg off the back foot
length, straightens after pitching, and he defends
goes back and punches this towards cover, but cannot beat the infield
shorter, flatter, and he goes back and guides this towards deep midwicket
tossed up, fuller, and he drives this towards cover
fired down the leg side, and it turns just a tad. He can tick it over with a little whip towards square leg
outside off, and he goes back and punches this past cover. Superb timing and placement from Hope
tossed up, just outside off, and he drives it hard back down the pitch. Fielded by Jadhav
short, and he goes back and pulls this towards deep midwicket. Just a single, with a sweeper in place
short, slow and he can hang back and slam this down towards long on
length, turns into him from just outside off, and he defends after getting behind the line
lower-arm action, as it angles into him, and he plays it away towards midwicket
short, angles across him, and he steers this down to third man
short, angles down the leg side
length, down the pads, and he can whip this away towards deep backward square leg
short, and he looks to flog this away towards midwicket. Comes off his midriff and trickles away to the left of Rishabh Pant
length, jags back into him, and he can only defend this towards point
full, on off stump, and he opens the face of the bat to run this to the right of deep point. Two easy runs
full ball, just outside off, and he digs it out to Ravindra Jadeja at point
whips away a length ball towards deep backward square leg

tosses this up, and Hope looks to go down the ground. Pant whips the bails off, and this has been referred for a stumping. Front foot from Jadeja is fine, as is Hope's back foot as he leans out. Not out
pulls out the reverse paddle sweep, and just plays it gently enough to allow a single down to short third man
drives a length ball off the back foot, but cannot beat cover
goes back and drags a length ball towrads wide long on
sharp turn away from Hope after pitching on off, and he can only flog it back towards the bowler
full ball, on off stump, and he tonks it down the ground to long on
full ball, and he digs it out and gets it towards extra cover
full, on off stump, and he hets it hard, but cannot beat mid off, who sits deep on the edge of the inner ring
full, towards the pads, and he looks to go big over midwicket. Inside edge carries it towards long leg, and they scurry back for the second

foxed by the slower ball! Change up, pitched up, and he looks to flog this towards midwicket. The ball was an off-cutter, and it grips and slows up after pitching. He swings, misses and hears the death-rattle behind him. This could turn out to be a blessing in disguise, as neither Hope nor Hetmyer have been able to get a move-on, despite having just completed a 50-run partnership
full ball, smacked back down the ground, and Shami soars to his right to grab on to it after pitching. Superb bit of fielding. Spring in his stride, understandably so
driven towards cover
flicks a length ball towards midwicket
length, turns into him after pitching on leg, and he flicks it towards midwicket

gets his man! Hurries on to Hope this time, and he goes back expecting the ball to turn slowly again. Beaten for pace, as much as the lack of movement. Bowled all ends up, and this could actually be a double blessing in disguise for the West Indies. Unleash the lower order hitters already!
turns away from him after pitching just outside off, and Holder leaves
overspin from wide of the crease, and the width on offer allows him to ease this towards extra cover
angles across Holder, who lets this pass
length, and he watches this closely as it angles across him again
length, width on offer too, and he cuts this hard, but cannot beat backward point

outstanding bit of fielding from Jadhav! This is fast, angling away from Holder, and he dabs it away towards short third man. Jadhav, stationed there, has to move quickly to his left and cut it off at full stretch. Outstanding work
short, and he punishes this away towards deep midwicket. Sluggish outfield will make it easy for long on to get around and stop it
fuller, and he drives this beautifully through covers. Shami at mid off couldn't put in the dive, and that just makes the ball hurry away further
flat, quick and turns away from him from outside off, and he taps it towards point and gets a single
uses his feet to get closer to the ball, but Jadeja throws it wider and puts more revs on it. Comes off his pads, and they can't pinch any runs
sharp turn back into him, and he cuts it gently towards point and they go through for a quick single
turn away from the bat, and he can punch this away towards deep point
tries a reverse sweep, but mistimes it on to his back leg. It pops up off the ground, but lands safely to the right of Pant
goes back and nurdles it away to square leg
short of length outside off, goes back and flat-bats it towards long-off
length ball around off and spinning away, worked away towards long-on from the back foot
flatter and quicker at 88kph outside off, Pooran goes for the cut but misses
goes wide outside off once again but ends up bowling too wide on this occasion
length ball on the stumps, Pooran rocks back and smashes it way over the boundary line in front of square leg
flatter and wider, cuts it towards sweeper cover
pitched up on the off stump, Holder drives it towards deep extra cover
a touch fuller on the pads, Holder works it towards long-on
length ball outside off, Pooran goes down on one knee and slog-sweeps it over deep midwicket
flatter but way too outside off, needs to be bowled again
length ball angling across, cuts it towards backward point for one
fuller on the pads, flicked away towards square leg
that's out of the park, length ball outside off, Pooran moves towards the off side and slog-sweeps it once again over deep midwicket
fuller on the pads, tucked away behind square leg, Holder was looking for the second but Pooran, rightly, sends him back

a soft dismissal in the end, fuller on the pads and Pooran just ends up chipping it to Manish Pandey at long-on. Played a handy knock of 30 off just 16 but West Indies would have preferred him to stay for a bit longer
fuller and wider outside off, drives it towards deep backward point for a couple
fuller around off, driven towards long-off but only for one
in the blockhole, just outside off, Brathwaite steers it towards point
fuller around off, comes forward and digs it out towards wide long-on
fuller outside off, driven but straight towards extra cover, Chahal there
length ball around off and spinning away sharply, Holder had no chance to play at that
flatter around off, 95kph, pushes it towards sweeper cover
length ball around off, coming in with the arm but then holding its line, Brathwaite was stuck on the back foot, gets beaten
length ball around off and spinning away to beat the bat and hit the batsman on the thigh

was that a drop? Fired in with the arm before it spins away to beat the bat, might have just snicked the bat but Pant fails to latch on to it. Replays confirm there was a big edge, shoulder of the bat
length ball around off, defended from the crease
length ball around off, Holder goes down the ground but doesn't get the timing right, only a single
length ball outside off, chops it towards sweeper cover for a couple
length ball, wide outside off, clears his front leg and slaps it towards long-off, didn't time it at all, more like toe-end of the bat
length ball angling across, looks to go big but fails to connect
length ball around off, Holder clears his front leg and goes aerial, doesn't get the required elevation though and ends up hitting straight down Kohli's throat at long-on
fuller and wider outside off, throws his bat at it, gets a thick outside edge but Dhawan is there at very fine short third man
a low toss outside off, smashed hard but straight towards long-off
fuller on the stumps, Allen digs it out down the wicket
a low full toss on the pads, flicked away but only a single to backward square leg
fuller around off, Allen hits it back towards Shami
fuller on the off stump, almost in the blockhole, digs it out towards long-on
fuller and wider this time, Brathwaite fails to get his bat on it, an excellent over from Shami
a slower length ball leaving the batsman, Pant fumbles though and concedes a bye
another slower one, just around the off stump, Brathwaite clears his front leg and pings the sightscreen on the full
lucky runs, was a low full toss on the stumps, Brathwaite swung across, got an inside edge that went through his legs and races towards the fine leg boundary

miscues the slog, was a slower length ball leaving the batsman, Brathwaite looks to pull it towards long-on but gets a top-edge, Pant jogs towards short fine leg and grabs it. He had his right glove off, so did well to take it
length ball outside off, Allen looks to cut but fails to connect
another length ball, throws his bat at it, gets an outside edge between short third man and backward point for four
short, and he slaps this over midwicket. Dismissive! No need for sighters here for Rohit Sharma
length, outside off, and this time he guides it past Gayle at first slip. Fine enough to beat third man!
length, outside off, and he lets this pass
length, angles into him, and he plays it off his pads to the right of midwicket
length, straight at him, and he plays a miscued flick in the air, but safely beyond Roach. Dawdles away towards mid on, and they slip through for a single
length, goes back and punches this hard, but cannot beat cover
full, outside off, and driven hard, but Lewis dives away to his left at cover point to save this
full, straight, and he plays it back ramrod straight! Shows the maker's name as he places it to the right of Holder in his follow through. Messrs Gavaskar and Boycott would approve

full, and he places this to the right of mid off. Superb timing again, as he finds the gap through the infield on the off side. Great intent from the Indian openers, as they look to cash in on the new ball and the 7 overs of Powerplay
fuller, on the pads, and he looks to whip this away towards the on side, gets it to square leg
back of a length, tucks into him, and he hangs back and drops this towards point. Calls Dhawan through for a quick single
length, and he plays it with soft hands towards covers and picks up a single
length, straightens into him, and he plays it away towards point
back of a length, and he drives this through the covers. Terrific bit of timing as he hangs back and gives it the full monty!
backs away initially towards the off side, and then allows the ball to slant across him. Cuts it, but cannot beat the man at point

Rohit could be in trouble here! Appeal for run-out at the non-striker's end. And that is the first Indian wicket! Was cut away by Dhawan, and there was a good diving stop at point. Sharma had come a long way down the wicket, and by the time he was sent back by Dhawan, it was too late. The bal was rifled in to Roach, who picked it well and whipped the bails off before Sharma could regain his ground
full ball, and he drags it towards Keemo Paul at mid off. Needs to pick this up clean, but cannot, and they scurry through for a single
length, angles into him, and he defends
short of a length, straightens into him, and he gets it off the pads as he plays it towards square leg
short, wide, and he goes back and punches this towards point
fuller, straighter, and he whips it off his pads towards long leg
looks to drive this, gets an outside edge, and it flies past Gayle and runs down to third man. On replays, it actually looks deliberate. Smart cricket!
length, holds up a bit on the pitch, and he plays it towards mid on
length, and he dabs this towards point
length, angles across him, and he plays it towards covers and takes a quick single
driven past point, and there's some work for Hetmyer to do in the deep at backward point to prevent it from going for four
fuller, angles in, and he defends this towards midwicket
full, and he goes for a whack towards midwicket. Skews this towards deep backward square
flicks one towards square leg
punches a length ball towards cover, where Pooran makes a hash of a simple fielding effort. They pinch a single by the time he can recover
looks to go full, but strays just a little too wide down the leg side

full again, straighter, and he looks to whip it away towards midwicket. Goes off his pads and they go through for a leg bye. Stifled appeal, but all of it from behind the stumps. Would have been straying down leg
shorter, wider. Too wide in fact, as Dhawan lets it pass
comes down the wicket and lashes a length ball towards mid off. They are able to pick up a single
length ball on the pads, and he flogs this away towards midwicket. Aerial, but safe enough

Hope drops one! This went through Kohli, and caught part of the inside edge as he looked to make room to play this through the on side, and it went through at a low, easy height for Hope, but he never got his gloves to it properly
short ball, cutter, and he plays it away towards square leg
fuller ball, angles into him, and he plays it away towards deep square leg
fuller ball, outside off, and he goes straight back over Roach. Takes the top hand off, but deliberately so, as he wanted to clear the infield. One-bounce four
length, jags into him, and he takes a half-step towards the bowler and then steers it down towards third man
shorter, wider, and he looks to drive this back down the pitch. The bat turns in his hands and goes back into the pitch. Easy fielding for Roach in his follow-through
fuller, and he hits this hard towards long on. Jason Holder at mid on gets low down to his right and stops this. Wasn't too far from Roach in his follow-through, in fact
SHOT! Slow off-cutter outside off, and Kohli spotted it from the hand. Gets down on one knee slightly, and smashes this through extra cover
slower ball, grips in the pitch again, and beats Kohli who is early into the shot as he tries to whip it away on the on side. Comes off his left shoulder, and he rebukes himself for the misjudgement
short, and a bit of width, and Dhawan slashes hard at this. Goes past Hope to his left. A bit fortuitous, but he'll take that
touch fuller, and beats Dhawan's attempted cut shot
slower ball, but down the leg side. Dhawan has a swipe at it, but it was beyond his blade anyway
slower ball, and he drives this towards midwicket
slower ball, outside off, and he drives this towards deep point
length, and he hangs back and hits this hard towards point. Pooran does well this time, diving away to his left to cut this off
full, and he smacks this hard, but cannot beat Chase at cover
drags it a bit short, flat, and Kohli bangs this away towards deep midwicket
length, and he punches this into the gap between long on and deep midwicket. Easy two
fuller, and he allows this to angle across him. Runs it towards short third man
length, doesn' turn much, but Kohli defends this
short, and he goes back and hammers this away towards deep backward point. Placed to perfection, as the man at the fence gives it a good chase, but cannot get to it
allows this to come to him, and runs it down to third man
slower length ball outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover to bring up the 50-run stand, off just 42 balls
length ball but angling down the leg side, Dhawan goes for the pull but cannot connect
length ball outside off, pushed off the back foot but straight towards the cover the fielder
length ball angling on the pads, Dhawan looks to work it on the leg side, misses but collects a leg-bye as the ball rolls on the off side off the pads
short of length around off, Kohli rises on his toes and drops it towards square leg for a quick single
nicely lofted over mid-off, was a slower length ball around off, Dhawan picked it up early and just chipped it over
short of length angling in, punches it towards sweeper cover off the back foot
fuller around off, opens the face of the bat for a single to short third man, Gayle there
length ball around off, goes back and punches it towards deep extra cover
length ball on the pads, goes for the flick but misses, collects it a leg bye to square leg
length ball on the stumps, goes back and flicks it towards deep square leg
fuller on the stumps, drives it back towards the bowler
length ball on the pads, flicks it towards square leg
length ball around off, some turn for Chase, Kohli was on the back foot, flicks it towards square leg
length on the stumps, flicked towards square leg once more, a fumble there allows a single
length ball angling in, Dhawan was looking to play on the leg side, misses and gets hit on the pads
short of length outside off, goes for the cut but finds backward point
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards midwicket
short of length this time, pulls it off the back foot but cannot beat short midwicket
fuller around off, skips down but drills it straight towards mid-off

goes down the track once again but cannot reach to the pitch of the ball, goes through the shot nonetheless, the ball hitting high on the bat and goes over mid-off, Paul pedals back and takes it over his shoulder
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards deep extra cover

can you guess it!? Pant skips down the track first ball but ends up mistiming it towards mid-off. He was looking to go leg side but the bottom hand comes off as he cannot reach to the pitch. Paul once again pedals backwards and takes another good catch
length ball outside off, Kohli goes for the cut but it's too close to him, almost chops it back onto his stumps
length around off, pushes it towards sweeper cover
length ball on the stumps, comes forward and works it towards midwicket with the turn
length ball around off, flatter and quicker at 91kph, defended from the back foot
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards long-on
works this length ball towards midwicket for another single
length ball on the stumps, worked towards long-on
length ball on the stumps, comes forward and flicks it towards square leg
length ball on the stumps, defended from the back foot
slower in the air this time, beats Iyer in flight who adjusts and works it towards short third man in the end
length around off, Iyer pushes it towards cover-point and looks to set off, a loud no from Kohli sends him back in time
short of length outside off, cuts it off the back foot towards deep point
length outside off, whipped from the front foot but straight towards extra cover
length ball outside off, comes forward and pushes it towards extra cover
short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
length ball on the pads and spinning further down, glanced fine for a couple
short of length outside off, goes back to pull but doesn't middle it, finds midwicket
length ball around off and spinning back, Kohli waits for it before playing it late towards short third man
comes forward to a length ball and turns it towards square leg
length ball around off, punched towards long-on off the back foot
arm ball, length around off and coming in with the angle to cramp the batsman who just manages to get his bat down in time
length ball outside off, a forward-press before rocking back to cut it past point for four
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards deep extra cover
goes back to this length ball and punches it towards sweeper cover
fuller around off, comes forward and finds extra cover with drive
length ball outside off, goes for the cut but fails to keep it down, luckily was in the gap. Gets a couple to deep point
flat, turns into him from outside off, and he drives this down to long on
uses his feet to get closer to a flatter ball, and nurdles it away towards square leg. Quick single taken
sharp turn in and he goes back and defends this towards square leg
short, wide, and he has thrashed this through extra cover. Evin Lewis puts in the dive from the sweeper cover fence, but cannot keep it from hitting the rope
fuller, wider, and he flogs this to long on, and brings up fifty for himself!
tossed up outside off, and he has a big swing, but misses out. Didn't turn this time
tossed up, but on the line of off stump, and he drives it to cover
slower, straighter, and he drives to covers again
brings his wrists into action to whip a similar length ball inside out over cover. There's a sweeper there, but they run briksly enough to come back for two
drives a fuller ball back, and Allen tries to flick this back towards the non-striker's end. That was close, but the ball rolled on and went through for a single

take that, says Iyer! Steps down the wicket and whacks this absolutely straight and high. That has sailed beyond the media centre, says Aishwarya. The ball has lodged on top of the media centre, in fact!
short, and he goes back and smashes this way over deep midwicket. Some two tiers high up into the stands. Imperious Iyer!
Kohli goes back to a wider, length ball, and drives it to deep point
length ball, he goes back and flicks towards midwicket. A bit of a fumble, but the fielder recovers quickly enough to get back into position
MASSIVE! This was in his arc, and he just slogged it across the line. Down on one knee, shades of a certain SR Waugh there
runs a wider ball outside off down to third man
length ball, driven back towards the bowler
delicate, as he plays this late, literally off the stumps down towards third man!
Kohli jumps down the wicket and tries to slog it towards midwicket. Gets an inner part of the bat, as it runs away towards fine leg
slower, side of the hand ball, and he waits on it and then runs it towards deep point for a single
fuller, and he drives it to cover
smashes a fuller ball, but cannot beat the man at mid off
slower ball, angles into him, and he plays it towards long on. Wanted two, but the fielder was quick to get across to it

full ball, and he drives it to covers. Holder allows this to go between his legs. Are the wheels coming off for West Indies here? The counter-attack from Iyer seems to have taken them by surprise a bit...
played and missed! Harmless straight ball, back of a length, and Kohli looks to run it down to third man, but misses out
short, gets a bit big on him as he looks to pull this. Jabs at it in the end, and it drops short of deep midwicket
fuller ball, and he whips it off his pads towards deep square leg
cutter, angles into him, and he drops it towards point and picks up a single
delightful! It's not a half-volley, but Kohli moves away to the on side and goes inside out over the infield. Crunches it, and that gave no chance to the fielders

short, and he runs this down towards deep backward point. Did well to steer it past short third man, and Fabian Allen ran around from deep point and dived away to his left, but couldn't prevent a four as his leg was touching the boundary when he momentarily pulled the ball back. Seemed in a bit of strife, but has recovered since
full, wide down the leg side, and a furtive attempt from Hope to prevent a wide being called with an appeal
slower ball, angles into him, and he taps it away towards point to hand strike back to his captain
full, but down the leg side again
slower ball, outside off, and he looks to slog this towards midwicket. Inside edge, and it drops near his leg stump, but doesn't hit it, and goes through to Hope!
length, and he drops it at his feet and takes off for a quick single. Iyer responds immediately
angles into him, and he plays this away towards deep midwicket
length, and he cuts this to the right of point. Good, diving stop, but won't prevent the single
length, straight, and he has just driven this straight back past the bowler...for SIX! Sumptuous
inside out, beautiful, as he knocks a length ball through the extra cover fence. Just zips off his bat as he advances down the wicket and meets a slower ball on the full
slower ball, and he allows that to go through
slow, short ball, and he hangs back and punches this towards sweeper cover
stays back and punches another length ball towards sweeper cover
cutter, short, and he plays it down at his feet with one hand off the handle. Picks up another quick single
cut to backward point
full ball, on the pads, and he whips this away towards deep midwicket. Good bit of fielding keeps them down to just two
drives a fuller ball through towards long off
slower ball, and he comes forward to meet it on the full and drive it away towards deep point
slower ball, on the pads, and he plays it away towards deep midwicket. Long on rushes in and keeps them down to just the single
leg cutter that slants back in from the on side, and he hangs back and plays this away towards deep midwicket
slow, short, and punished through deep midwicket, with surgeon-like precision
length but room outside off, steers it past the point fielder to bring up his second successive fifty. Hundred of the stand also comes up
fuller and much closer to the batsman, dabs it towards third man for a quick single
slower length ball outside off, pushes it towards extra cover, away from the body
short of length outside off, forehands it towards deep extra cover
slower length ball, cuts it towards pint and sets off, a misfield there allows the second run
fuller on the off stumps, backs away a bit and steers it towards sweeper cover
slower length ball outside off, places it towards sweeper cover
length ball but down the leg side, another extra for India
short of length outside off, extra bounce pings his right thumb, the ball dribbles towards short third man. Kohli immediately signals for the physio. He's in some pain there
length ball outside off, opens the face of the bat to work it towards point
length ball on the stumps, moves towards the off side and tucks it away towards square leg
short of length around off, dabs it towards point and looks to steal a run but realises there isn't any
fuller around off, drops it towards extra cover who is at the edge of the circle
length ball around off, spinning in and keeping low, Kohli tucks it towards square leg
a touch fuller around off, comes forward and works it towards short midwicket
fuller around off, comes forward again and pushes it back towards the bowler
flatter outside off, goes back and pulls it towards deep midwicket
length ball on the pads, looks to swat it away but misses
fuller on the stumps and Iyer launches it over deep square leg for a six, for the second time today
length ball around off, punched off the back foot towards long-on
fuller around off, goes aerial but ends up chipping straight to Holder at long-off, Iyer is disappointed with himself but West Indies have an opening, or do they?
length ball around off, a cutter from Roach, Kohli pushes at it and it goes just over the bowler's head
length ball around off, comes forward and dabs it towards short midwicket
fuller on the stumps, comes forward and across and flicks it towards short midwicket once more
short of length outside off, pulls it towards deep midwicket to get off the mark
length ball around off, comes forward and pushes it towards cover-point
length ball around off, comes forward and flicks it towards deep square leg
down the track, reaches the pitch of the ball and lofts it with the spin, over deep midwicket boundary for a six
length ball around off, spinning sharply on to the pads, worked away towards backward square leg
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards the bowler
length ball on middle and leg, flicked towards backward square leg
length ball around off, comes forward and pushes it towards sweeper cover
bouncer and Kohli goes for the pull, wasn't in control at all, gets a top-edge but luckily for him the fine leg is up and it bounces a couples of times before reaching the boundary
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards extra cover
deft touch will get him another boundary, was a length ball outside off, Kohli opened the face at the last moment to send it between the keeper and the short third man
that's hundred No. 43 for Virat Kohli. Was fuller on the stumps and flicked away towards deep midwicket, soaks in the applause
short of length outside off, Jadhav steers it past point for four more
fuller outside off and Kohli just extends his arms to execute a lofted extra cover drive, easy-peasy
length ball on the stumps, tucked away towards midwicket for one
fuller on the stumps, Jadhav works it towards long-on
short of length around off, dabs it towards cover-point and gets to the other end
fuller on the pads and clipped away towards deep square leg, a diving stop by Pooran keeps it to two
fuller around off, moves across and flicks it in front of square leg
length ball outside off, cuts it in front of point for one
an attempted bouncer, Kohli pulls it down from the front foot, Lewis at deep midwicket puts in the dive but cannot stop it
that's it. Straying on the pads and clipped away fine for another boundary, that's the game and the series
